Last month, I signed onto the Postal Preservation Act(HR 7015). The bill provides for funding, and ensures our Postal Service survives, thrives and is protected during the Coronavirus pandemic and beyond. Over the last few hours, storms and powerful winds have damaged huge areas of South Jersey, while we are in the midst of a public health crisis. I am asking the Governor to declare an immediate State of Emergency to help our community rebuild. We need the help now more than ever.

Together with @repcunningham, I introduced the Coastal and Marine Economies Protection Act to permanently ban oil and gas leasing off the Atlantic and Pacific coasts. It is my honor to continue the fight for healthy ocean ecosystems. #100DaysForThePeople #100days https://t.co/B09bKtylxb

At the Rally to Save Our Seas in Cape May, NJ I stood with elected officials and the people of South Jersey to show our united opposition to seismic testing in the Atlantic Ocean. #ACEPA #NoSeismic #ProtectOurCoast #BlocktheBlast #100days #100daysforthepeople https://t.co/MsZmBtqWr9
